title.rendered: A Less Expensive and Easier to Use Legal Research Tool

content.rendered:
By: Karl Bickmore, CEO, Snap Tech IT

Whenever I come across a useful new tool on the market that I think might benefit our customers, I’m always eager to share it. And what better way to get the information to the most people possible than blogging about it? I recently had one of those moments, when I came across an inexpensive and easy-to-use legal research tool. Here’s how it happened.

While attending an entrepreneur conference, I sat through a presentation on disruptive innovations, during which they highlighted several emerging technologies and a few tools that are already available. One that caught my attention is a new legal research tool that is meant to replace Lexus Nexus. It’s called Casetext.

I wanted to share the information about this new tool to our customers in the legal field and anyone else who may benefit. This utility uses a groundbreaking form of artificial intelligence (A.I.) called CARA A.I or CARA, for short. It comes in quite handy when researching case law. Simply provide CARA with minor details about the case. CARA does the research for you and returns the relevant search items.

The organization that created this is hitting the market aggressively by offering it at a much lower price point than Lexus Nexus, who currently owns this market. It even offers ways to engage for free until your Lexus Nexus contract runs out.

I want to be clear that I am not being compensated for bringing this information to your attention. I just saw a disruptive choice, leveraging the latest AI technology that does everything you want technology to do. It is easier to use, just as effective and costs far less than its competitor.

I encourage those needing to do legal research to evaluate this new tool.  Maybe it will work for you.

Here is a link to where you can find out more:  https://casetext.com
